duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with patients to assess their physical, psychosocial, and emotional condition during regular nursing visits.
Take the lead on managing each patient’s journey through their specific illness and ensuring patients and families understand each step.
Work collaboratively with the interdisciplinary team and patients/caregivers to establish goals of care and ensure regular communication on progress.
Follow nursing standards of practice and meet or exceed quality goals for the best possible outcomes for the patient and family.
Other specific goals and duties as communicated in the job description and performance goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing or related field (BSN preferred)
